TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInputElement

summary.span: 透過 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 項目建立一般事件，以及與事件相關的屬性和用以處理基本輸入的方法。

span.span: Establishes the common events and also the event-related properties and methods for basic input processing by Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 雖然這個介面是公用的但它不是應用程式或架構建置案例中實作。Although this interface is public, it is not intended to be implemented in application or framework-building scenarios. 這個介面是公用的因為連線的繼承需求[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]至核心[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]架構。This interface is public because of the inheritance requirements for connecting the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] core to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework. 您也可以使用轉型機制為這個介面，以強制執行輸入的事件和屬性，將來自於 或，但可以處理相同的輸入模型中。You can also use this interface as a casting mechanism to enforce that the input events and properties will come from either a or , which can be handled in the same input model. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 架構](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-architecture.md)，另請參閱[基底項目概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。For more information, see [WPF Architecture](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-architecture.md) and also see [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddHandler (System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, Delegate handler);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddHandler(class System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, class System.Delegate handler) cil managed
public: void AddHandler(System::Windows::RoutedEvent ^ routedEvent, Delegate ^ handler);

param.name: routedEvent
param.span: 要處理之路由事件的識別項。

span.span: The identifier for the routed event that is being handled.
A reference to the handler implementation.

summary.span: 將特定路由事件的路由事件處理常式加入項目中。

span.span: Adds a routed event handler for a specific routed event to an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CaptureMouse() cil managed

summary.span: 嘗試強制將滑鼠的捕捉給這個項目。

span.span: Attempts to force capture of the mouse to this element.

returns.span: 如果成功捕捉到滑鼠則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the mouse is successfully captured; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CaptureStylus() cil managed

summary.span: 嘗試強制將手寫筆的捕捉給這個項目。

span.span: Attempts to force capture of the stylus to this element.

returns.span: 如果成功捕捉到手寫筆則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the stylus is successfully captured; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Focus() cil managed

summary.span: 嘗試將鍵盤的焦點放在這個項目上。

span.span: Attempts to focus the keyboard on this element.

returns.span: 如果鍵盤焦點移至這個項目上，或早已在此項目上，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if keyboard focus is moved to this element or already was on this element; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Focusable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出焦點可否設在這個項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether focus can be set to this element.

value.span: 如果可將焦點設定到此項目上則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the element can have focus set to it; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱和) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see and ) establish this property as a dependency property.

summary.span: 鍵盤以此元素為焦點時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the keyboard is focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface.

summary.span: 元素擷取滑鼠時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the element captures the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 當項目捕捉滑鼠時，該項目會收到滑鼠輸入，即使資料指標位於其範圍外。When an element captures the mouse, that element receives mouse input even if the cursor is outside its bounds. 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取以這種方式，並保留擷取，直到拖放作業的拖放動作發生。The mouse is typically captured in this manner only during drag-and-drop operations and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.

summary.span: 元素擷取手寫筆時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the element captures the stylus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 當項目擷取手寫筆時，該元素會收到手寫筆輸入，即使資料指標位於其範圍外。When an element captures the stylus, that element receives stylus input even if the cursor is outside its bounds. 手寫筆只在拖放作業時，通常擷取以這種方式，而且會保留擷取拖放作業的拖放動作發生之前。The stylus is typically captured in this manner only during drag-and-drop operations, and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示這個項目是否已在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中啟用。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this element is enabled in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].

value.span: 如果已啟用該項目則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the element is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱和) 進行讀取/寫入，並建立此屬性為相依性屬性的這個屬性。Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see and ) make this property read/write and establish this property as a dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsKeyboardFocused As Boolean
public: property bool IsKeyboardFocused { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出這個項目是否具有鍵盤焦點。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this element has keyboard focus.

value.span: 如果這個項目具有鍵盤焦點則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this element has keyboard focus; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱和) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see and ) establish this property as a dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsKeyboardFocusWithin As Boolean
public: property bool IsKeyboardFocusWithin { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出鍵盤焦點是否在項目範圍內的任何位置，包括鍵盤焦點是否在任何視覺子項目的範圍內。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether keyboard focus is anywhere inside the element bounds, including if keyboard focus is inside the bounds of any visual child elements.

value.span: 如果鍵盤焦點在項目或其子項目上則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if keyboard focus is on the element or its child elements; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱和) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see and ) establish this property as a dependency property.

span.span: if the mouse pointer is over this element; otherwise, .

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示手寫筆是否位在這個項目上方 (或其範圍內的視覺子項目上方)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 某些核心類別可實作，例如，也會實作這個屬性會追蹤變更的事件。Some core classes that implement , such as , also implement an event that tracks changes to this property. 不過，這個介面不包含這類事件，為其合約的一部分。However, this interface does not include such an event as part of its contract. 中的現有實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心 (請參閱和) 建立此屬性為相依性屬性。Existing implementations in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] core (see and ) establish this property as a dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面不是公用的實作。This interface is not intended for public implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註介面。For more information, see remarks for the interface. 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，它收到滑鼠輸入，即使資料指標位於其框線外。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the cursor is outside its borders. 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaiseEvent(class System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: 類別的執行個體，其中包含要引發之事件的識別項。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the identifier for the event to raise.

summary.span: 引發由所提供之 內的 屬性所指定的路由事件。

span.span: Raises the routed event that is specified by the property within the provided .

MemberSignature.Value: public void RemoveHandler (System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, Delegate handler);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveHandler(class System.Windows.RoutedEvent routedEvent, class System.Delegate handler) cil managed

param.name: routedEvent
param.span: 附加處理常式之路由事件的識別項。

span.span: Identifier of the routed event for which the handler is attached.

param.name: handler
param.span: 要從這個項目的事件處理常式集合中移除的特定處理常式實作。

span.span: The specific handler implementation to remove from this element's event handler collection.

summary.span: 移除這個項目中所指定路由事件處理常式的所有執行個體。

span.span: Removes all instances of the specified routed event handler from this element.
